mapper.select: select * from t_order_ship_loadinginfo where ID=#{id} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_order_ship_loadinginfo where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_order_ship_loadinginfo where ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select t.* from t_order_ship_loadinginfo t join t_order f on t.order_no = f.order_no where f.id=#{orderId} and t.ALIVE_FLAG='1'
